title: Commandnpc 绑定指令时出错
txt_content:
本帖最后由 20001124 于 2019-7-23 19:23 编辑 

服务端为 1.12.2  cat端   插件版本是 CommandNPC-1.9.1
输入 commandnpc  提示 An internal error cccurred while attempting to perform this command
在后台输 plugins   commandnpc是加载中的 

后台报错 
Server thread/ERROR ]: null 
org.bukkit.command.CommandException: Cannot execute command 'commandnpc' in plugin CommandNPC v1.9.1 - plugin is disabled.
